actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture and the Secretary of the Interior to quitclaim to the State Superintendent of Education of the State of South Carolina rights retained by the United States to certain land in Orangeburg County, South Carolina.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture and the Secretary of the Interior to execute a quitclaim deed conveying and releasing to the State Superintendent of Education of the State of South Carolina rights retained by the United States to certain land in Orangeburg County, South Carolina.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Agriculture and the Secretary of the Interior to quitclaim to the State Superintendent of Education of the State of South Carolina rights retained by the United States to certain land in Orangeburg County, South Carolina.
